The question formats are appropriate, and I like the audio feature. There's a range of standards that have practice, and I appreciate that the standards are laid out in a logical sequence."

"My students like the immediate feedback and the SmartScore. It gives them a sense of accomplishment. My level 1 and level 2 students were 10 percentage points above the district average on their semester exams. I believe that Rurera had a lot to do with that."

"I use Rurera regularly in all of my classes. I like that students have points deducted for wrong answers, which encourages them to take more time and evaluate their answers before submitting. I also like that students are provided with an explanation on how to correctly work the problems for each question they miss."

"I love Rurera because it allows me to teach multiple lessons simultaneously at multiple levels. It also allows for remediation and extension activities to increase skills and challenge in the classroom. Students thoroughly enjoy working on Rurera and push themselves for mastery of assigned lessons. Many will also redo lessons before quizzes and tests to prepare and review."
"The awards give my students a goal. The immediate feedback when they get an answer wrong helps improve their understanding."

"Rurera is brilliant. I am using it for autistic secondary students who need literacy and numeracy support. I love the instant feedback, the huge library of questions available, and the teacher insights!"
"I like that Rurera holds the students accountable and ensures they do their own work. I also love that it gives the students feedback."

Rurera is easy to set up and essential for upper-grade students. I use it daily for teaching and practice, tailoring lessons to address individual and class needs. It's the most effective app, but I wish it integrated with our Clever login.

"I like the Live Classroom feature where I can see what students are doing in real time. I also really like the new learning games - there are games that are actually fun to play, not just randomly generated worksheets disguised as games."

"I love using the diagnostic tool to measure what grade level students ACTUALLY are. Due to the rigor of the International Baccalaureate curriculum, I frequently utilize Rurera as a remediation tool to bridge gaps."

"I used Rurera ALL the time in the classroom and believed that it was hands down the most powerful learning resource out there. My favorite part is the personalization aspect. All students had to do was put in their recent MAPs scores and voila! They had their own personalized plan. Pure genius!"

"I love that students get instant feedback on each problem they miss and I can easily create quizzes based on specific skills. I also love that I can instantly see how students are doing and send them a message to encourage them."

"What I LOVE MOST about Rurera is when students get the answer wrong, it takes away points. This makes the students work harder to ensure that they get the answer RIGHT! I also LOVE that when students get the answer wrong, they are provided with a step-by-step answer with explanation. Rurera has helped my students become more successful learners by providing UNLIMITED questions."

"Rurera has many benefits in the classroom. My students have become more self-directed through their use of Rurera. Through consistent use of the Diagnostic tool, my students can target and strengthen their areas of weakness. They enjoy watching their numbers grow over the weeks and months."

"I have been using Rurera as a bell-ringer activity daily for 7-10 minutes with my social studies students. I love the social studies content!! There are so few opportunities available that have this type of support for social studies—most focus only on math or ELA."
We use Rurera's Diagnostic tool weekly to track student growth. The data motivates students to improve and take ownership of their learning. They eagerly celebrate their gradual progress each week.

"The best part about Rurera is that all the questions and skills are aligned to standards. I love how my students are so proud of themselves when they see the amount of time they spent on using Rurera and all the certificates they collected."

"My favorite part about Rurera is its alignments to the textbooks that I currently teach in my math and elective courses. They are VERY helpful. Rurera became my go-to website for my students when they are stuck with a concept or need to review on other concepts."

"The diagnostic that connects to skills on the recommendations wall has allowed my students to improve, on average by 2.6 YEARS in the past five months. I will fight tooth and nail if necessary to keep Rurera available every year from now on, and I want to move this model into every single grade of our K-12 school."

"I like that I can switch between different grade levels based on the students' needs. My younger students are encouraged by the awards, and older students feel gratified when they get the questions correct."

"I use Rurera in a variety of ways. I love the new Rurera Group Jam feature. I also use Rurera Diagnostic and then print out their recommendations pages for them to work on during morning work. I use Rurera Live, Score Grid, and Student Quickview to monitor student progress on a moment-by-moment basis. I love that Rurera gives students feedback on what they are getting right and why they are getting things wrong. Rurera is an integral part of my classroom."
"It allows students to work on their own levels and at their own pace. I also love that I can see what they are doing when they are doing it, provide feedback or help in real time."

"As Rurera is an EFL country, public school students start to learn English as a subject from the 1st grade. However, some students attend bilingual (Chinese/English) kindergartens, so the English level is very different. Using Rurera can help my students learn based on their own level, especially during the school lockdown time now. Also, Rurera is pretty user-friendly, so they can practice the alphabet/phonics skills anytime they want."

"The diagnostic that connects to skills on the recommendations wall has allowed my students to improve, on average by 2.6 YEARS in the past five months. I will fight tooth and nail if necessary to keep Rurera available every year from now on, and I want to move this model into every single grade of our K-12 school."

"The only way to get the hang of math is to practice it. I use Rurera after I teach a lesson but before assigning homework in order to give my students the opportunity to get the hang of the concept without being afraid of getting the wrong answer. They are able to figure out where they may have gone wrong and self-correct. They are more independent, and it has given them 'the freedom to fail' because they are no longer afraid to get the question wrong and learn from their mistakes."
"I ask them to do 10 questions a day, but they get engaged in the learning. Most students want the medals gained, and it's lighthearted competition amongst themselves. Way cool!!!!"
"Rurera has greatly helped to fill learning gaps and has provided accountability for progress and time-on-task behavior."

"After using Rurera for two years during our intervention time, my 5th graders had an average growth of 56% on the state assessments, and my 6th graders had a growth rate of 82%. Every student in my class met the standards for the school year!"

We just started using Rurera last year, but our school loves it. Parents like to see statistics, so the reports with the graphs are a big hit. Also, with any of our students who have IEP's, it helps us track their progress.

When I assign a Rurera lesson, I can let kids work together because they cannot cheat. Each student has a different problem but the same concept. I love overhearing the students helping each other and working out the solution together.

I like the breakdown of specific skills that correlate with grade level, I like the easy user interface, and I really like the correct explanations with illustrations for the answers to each question. Students and teachers love the ease of use, the reports, and awards. Thank you so much for creating an amazing math website.
My children are loving it and I have also received great comments from parents. In class, they are begging to get on your site!!!
Students are retaining their learning and understanding because they are being given more opportunities to embed it into long-term memory. As a result, they're more successful.

This is our first week of Rurera. The kids were pleading with me to go onto Rurera half an hour before school started this morning. Other teachers that walked into the room were astounded to see our 16 notebook computers all being used by excited kids doing MATHS!!
My students are improving by the day, and some even stay in for recess to work on Rurera!

I have been walking around on cloud nine since I started using Rurera because it is everything I needed and more. I got my own children started, I got my principal using it for his own kids, I got a subscription for my class, and I have told every teacher I can about it! Thanks!!

The entire site is amazing. I love the fact that as a teacher you are able to create accounts for your students, track their progress, and view a rich assortment of reports showing you just how much they are improving. Also, the interactive style and scoring method for the students are great.

I love the tracking ability of the program. I am able to see what my students are working on at any given time of the day or night and what areas they are currently concentrating on. I also have students working on individual programs at various grade levels, and this allows them to work with the rest of the class and instills a sense of belonging. My students are more motivated than I have ever seen them, and it's very exciting to see.
Rurera really boosted my junior high daughter's confidence in math – so much so that I asked my school if I could get a subscription for my math classes.

Your site is fantastic, and it is great that it is aligned with the new Australian curriculum. The kids are loving the problem-solving and also that they get instant feedback. This has led to greater confidence and engagement.

I love that my child has the opportunity to review concepts and advance to the next stages when mastery is achieved. I love that if a child struggles with a topic or lesson, you can go below grade level for extra practice, and once mastery is achieved, you can go to higher grade levels for advanced practice. The comprehensive practice across subjects is excellent!

"Rurera is amazing in every way. The questions, the quick feedback, the awards and certificates - it's all great!"
